The quicker, friendlier way to share what you have to say! Just click, record, and get a link you can post anywhere. Listeners can hear you loud and clear, and send you voice replies back! 

All voice messages are stored in your telbee inbox, transcribed to text automatically, so you can read for speed, and listen for context...

__________________________________________________________________

SAY WHAT YOU MEAN, QUICKLY AND CONVENIENTLY

We all have a lot to say... now you can say it, share it, and hear back!

At telbee we're all about helping people and businesses come together, personally and conveniently online!

So we've brought telbee’s award-winning online voice messaging to your Chrome browser. Use our extension to record voice messages, quickly and naturally, whenever you need to - then share them with anyone with via a simple link!

Listeners will hear you what you have to say, and can optionally send you voice replies back! No download or sign-ups required.

HOW IT WORKS:

1. RECORD your voice message
Click the telbee extension icon, or use our handy keyboard shortcuts (CTRL+SHIFT+9 then the ENTER key) to start recording immediately

2. Get a link to SHARE
We create a unique link for each voice message you record - paste it into your social media, emails, web pages, newsletters or anywhere else for your customers, community, friends, family and anyone else to listen to. You can also add a text title to share the headline of your message

3. People LISTEN, and can REPLY!
If you want, your listeners can send you voice replies back. All messages  arrive in your telbee voice inbox, and you can keep the conversation going by replying again! Easy, personal, and 3x faster than typing!


SO WHAT CAN I USE TELBEE FOR?

Whether it's to support, to sell, to educate or to engage - your voice does it best!

★ Share your thoughts
---> Express your feelings, opinions and ideas for your community, friends and family, or for the public!

★ Feedback 
---> Put out a voice survey or question, and receive voice responses

★ Teaching  
---> Give your students voice assignments, or provide feedback on their work

★ Sales 
---> Share the passion for your pitch in your own voice, and really understand what matters to the people you’re speaking with from their replies

★ Community
---> Get everyone using telbee to share and discuss their ideas on the topics that matter most to you!

★ Personal voice notes 
---> Just record a message... and don't share the link! All recordings are stored in your inbox for you to listen to at any time.
